ygData.subject: Re: Amendment to North Qeynos Auction/Trade Show
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you very much for offering your invisibility services, Scylla. That is an excellent idea.  Very well, ALL races, regardless of color =) or alignment are
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you very much for offering your invisibility services, Scylla.
That is an excellent idea. Very well, ALL races, regardless of color
=) or alignment are hereby formally invited to the North Qeynos
Auction/Trade show this Sunday @ 12PM PST. Thank you very much. See
you there! Any magic users able to cast invisibility are appreciated.


>From: "Christine" <christine@...>
>Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
>To: <Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com>
>Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] Re: Amendment to North Qeynos
Auction/Trade Show
>Date: Wed, 21 Apr 1999 20:44:53 -0700
>
>From: "Christine" <christine@...>
>
>
>>Fellow Norrathians:
>>
>>I would like to make a small change in my previous message regarding
>>the North Qeynos Auction/Trade show on the Bristlebane Server:
>>
>>When I said all good-aligned characters are invited, I meant all
>>characters that will not be attacked by the Qeynos City Guards.
>
>Well actually, I think it may be interesting to formally invite ALL
races,
>namely because some things which are common in other places are rare
in
>Qeynos, etc, and thus would make the auction much more interesting.
>
>For things like this on other servers, they have offered 'invisible'
>services, allowing them to sneak past any relevant guards. My mage
will be
>willing to help out with this, as I'm sure others will.
>
>Scylla
>
>
>---------------------------------------------------------------------
---
>Looking to expand your world?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>ONElist has over 115,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
